name: Mega Man Zero 4 [GBA]
description:
Dr. Weil has taken over Neo Arcadia and ordered any Maverick—humans or
Reploids opposing his rule—to be marked for extermination! Take up arms
as Zero faces this latest nemesis, equipping new weapons to use in
battle. Choose Easy or Normal Mode, affecting the difficulty level,
weather, and skills obtained.
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
